jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Build and maintain user-facing features for a modern web application using React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
jobs.requirements: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and version control with Git.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Develop server-side logic, databases, and APIs for high-performance applications.
jobs.requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and RESTful APIs.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and engaging user interfaces for web and mobile applications.
jobs.requirements: Experience with design tools like Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead cross-functional teams to develop and launch new products and features.
jobs.requirements: 3+ years experience in product management, agile methodologies.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Oversee the marketing strategies for digital and traditional channels.
jobs.requirements: Proven track record in digital marketing, SEO, and social media campaigns.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze complex datasets to provide actionable insights and recommendations.
jobs.requirements: Expert in Python, R, SQL, and machine learning algorithms.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Work on automation, cloud infrastructure, and CI/CD pipelines to improve system reliability.
jobs.requirements: Experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and Terraform.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Develop and manage both front-end and back-end of web applications.
jobs.requirements: Proficient in JavaScript, Node.js, React, and SQL databases.

jobs.title: QA Engineer
jobs.description: Ensure the quality of software products through manual and automated testing.
jobs.requirements: Experience in testing tools like Selenium, JUnit, and automated testing frameworks.

jobs.title: Content Writer
jobs.description: Write and edit high-quality content for blogs, websites, and digital marketing campaigns.
jobs.requirements: Strong writing, editing, and research skills. Experience in SEO writing.
